{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Accton |model=WG3005B 1-17 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/21/2002 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=HEDWG3005B1-17 |ic_id= |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=ADMtek |cpu1_model=ADM5106 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F800B3BA90 |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Atmel |wi1_chip1_model=AT76C502A |wi1_chip2_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip2_model=RF3000 |wi1_chip3_brand=RFMD |wi1_chip3_model=RF2948B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} The FCC test report lists the following models as covered by this FCC ID... *WG3005B1 *'''PCI''' BLW-04EX ([[Planex BLW-04EX]]) *'''SMC''' SMC7004VWBR ([[SMC SMC7004VWBR v1]])
The shell in the FCC photos is marked with '''Broad Lanner Wave''', which appears to be for the '''Planex''' BLW-04EX.
The FCC manual states the specifications for the device, which are below... *'''Output power:''' >+15dBm, Typically +17dBm *'''Recieve sensitivity''' (at 8% BER 1E-5) **-80dBm for 11Mbps **-83dBm for 5.5Mbps **-88dBm for 2Mbps **-90dBm for 1Mbps "P/N:141330220000E REV:0A" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
